name: Richland
startIntroPart1: Chairman Zhong Xina, ruler of the mountains, creator of both blade and gun!
startIntroPart2: Supreme Leader, will you harness the will of the Richmin? Will your labors amount to the most productive society the world has seen?
declaringWar: Your graves have been dug already.
attacked: Foolish rat! Our armies are legion!
defeated: And so it ends. I hereby proclaim thee the rightful ruler of Richland.
introduction: I am Zhong Xina, emperor of the highest nation in the world. What brings you before me?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Let us return to our mines, and you to your homes.
tradeRequest: Let the fruits of our labors entwine.
